landingDescription: Transfer money securely, manage transactions, and pay without hassle with ChokoMe's accessible digital payment platform.
demoNotice: This is a demo app. All interactions are simulated.
noTransactions: No transactions yet. Start by topping up your account.
topUpFailed: Top up failed. Please try again later.
unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
nfcInstructions: Place your phone near another ChokoMe user's device to initiate transfer via NFC.
qrInstructions: Scan another user's QR code to initiate a transfer.
myQRCode: My QR Code (Let others scan this)
recipientPlaceholder: Enter recipient ID or scan QR
sendFailed: Failed to send money. Please try again.
nfcNotSupported: NFC is not supported on your device.
nfcScanFailed: Failed to scan NFC. Please try again.
nfcReadError: Error reading NFC data. Please try again.
invalidQRCode: Invalid QR code. Please scan again.
offlineSendError: Sending money requires an internet connection
offlineSupportLimited: Support content is limited while offline. Please check your connection.
supportDescription: Need help with your ChokoMe account? Find answers to common questions below or contact our support team.
name: Name
forgotPINAnswer: For security reasons, you cannot recover your PIN. Please contact our support team to verify your identity and reset your PIN.
accountLimit: Is there a limit on my account?
accountLimitAnswer: Yes, standard accounts have a daily transaction limit of 500,000 FCFA. You can increase this limit by completing additional verification.
failedTransaction: My transaction failed but money was deducted
failedTransactionAnswer: Don't worry! Failed transactions are typically reversed within 24 hours. If not, please contact our support with your transaction ID.
refundPolicyAnswer: Refunds for incorrect transfers can be processed within 72 hours of the transaction. Contact support with the transaction details.
appNotWorking: The app is not working properly
appNotWorkingAnswer: Try clearing your browser cache and reloading the app. If issues persist, ensure you're using the latest browser version.
offlineModeAnswer: ChokoMe works offline for viewing your balance and transaction history. For sending money or topping up, you'll need an internet connection.
